title: OI analyzer
content:
OI Analyzer combines two market indicators Bid/Ask and Open Interest (OI). Each of these indicators is a very powerful instrument for market analysis, but when used together, they create a unique indicator that allows you to see the volume of opening / closing positions of buyers and sellers separately in certain price zones.
Important! This indicator only works for futures on the Russian market, as well as on the Binance and Bybit exchanges. For other instruments, OI data is not transmitted in real-time. The indicator only operates within the current trading day, which is done to optimize server load.

To add and set up the indicator, open the Indicators settings window.


Indicator's settings

Custom diapason

NameDescription
Enabled If enabled, a custom range of values is used when calculating the indicator, otherwise default values.
Range Specifies the minimum allowed value and the maximum allowed value.

Calculation

NameDescription
Mode Sets one of the available buy/sell modes.

Options:
  • Buys
  • Sells
Calculation Mode Calculation Mode of the Indicator

Options:
  • Cumulative Trades - Cumulative trades: in this case, the calculation is made taking into account the change in the OI of only market trades that took place in the feed, and the direction is determined by the difference in the change in open interest up or down, respectively.
  • Separated Trades - Separate trades: in this case, the real change in open interest is taken into account separately for ask and bid trades, both market orders and limit orders combined with them.
Cumulative mode A mode in which only cumulative transactions are used in calculations.
Clusters mode Determines whether the chart is displayed in cluster mode.

Grid

NameDescription
Grid step Sets the height of the grid row.
Line Visualization settings for the grid line.

NameDescription

Drawing
